title: Zed in 8.10
body:
I am _terrified_ of this guy come 8.10. GA buffs? Maw buffs? Last whisper buffs? Armor nerfs for ADC's? Weaker mage roster in 8.9? Previous tabi nerfs? 

Oh my, I am not prepared for this.

replies.body: Obvious answer. Perma ban and learn to fight a Yasuo with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items.

***bans Yasuo***

Ok now we just have to learn to fight a Tryndamere with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items
I think trynd is will be the only champion that will be able to rush IE after these changes
Every ie second build had 60% crit chance. I can still see it getting rushed

Tryn will have 70% crit with just a single item though.  I plan on this being my build order next patch.

{{item:3077}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3124}}  with final item being one of these depending on how much armor the enemy has {{item:3033}} {{item:3142}}
Yes, but Tryn already has 55% with a single item. He seems to want attack speed more than the straight up IE for more crits rather than bigger crits, which is why I don't think he will rush it.
Did you miss the part about the changes?  Tryn only needs a single item to get 70% crit.  The attack speed is why I plan to get stinger before IE once the change happens.
I read them. I'm saying that I think tryn will STILL want a zeal item first because it gives him more crits while he is ramping up for IE.
swap triforce with Razor? The thing gives +25% AS and +8% movement speed on crit.

The biggest point of triforce is the cdr.  Triforce also has a constant 40% attack speed and 5% movement speed with phage giving 40 movement speed every time you kill something.  Stormrazor will definitely be good no him, but I prefer to have the cooldown reduction with it.  The only other item giving both cdr and attack speed is nashor's tooth which isn't ideal for a crit build.

I'm sorry my team includes 2 stuns, Tryndamere is no longer a problem.

Tryndamere is extremely easy to counter and honestly I don't understand why you're complaining about him when he's such garbage against a mediocre team comp.
I'm confused as to why you find my statement of a fact to be a complaint
-bans tryn too- ok now we just have to fight the yi with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items

+ Armor Pen from ult and items. But now his crit will no longer deal +50% damage from IE and his passive will really make him deal less damage to squishy targets. But tanks ? Tanks ? What is that ? 36% true damage, and +50% Armor Pen for the 64% for the Physical damages.

> [{quoted}](name=Sylennus,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-02T11:48:11.210+0000)
>
> + Armor Pen from ult and items. But now his crit will no longer deal +50% damage from IE and his passive will really make him deal less damage to squishy targets. But tanks ? Tanks ? What is that ? 36% true damage, and +50% Armor Pen for the 64% for the Physical damages.

True but as most squishy targets build something like seekers to combat him, an already bad item is now even more pointless :(

> [{quoted}](name=Sylennus,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-02T11:48:11.210+0000)
>
> + Armor Pen from ult and items. But now his crit will no longer deal +50% damage from IE and his passive will really make him deal less damage to squishy targets. But tanks ? Tanks ? What is that ? 36% true damage, and +50% Armor Pen for the 64% for the Physical damages.

I really dont understand all the tank hate. I know its 100% because of competitive, because tanks are complete shit in solo Q. Just go look at their win-rates compared to fighters/assassins/anything else. Now you got crap like conqueror just cutting them to pieces in the top lane, too. And more true damage? 

These changes are 100% for competitive because one look at solo Q stats shows you that tanks are actually complete crap. What are the "best" tanks right now? Singed? lol. Playing a tank in solo Q you are 100% putting the game in your team's hands, because there is probably going to be 1 or 2 champs in the game, you may even lane against one, that completely invalidates you with some kind of true damage or tank busting nowadays.

But, they are good in competitive.
If tanks are shit its because the player on them isnt getting carried...

> [{quoted}](name=HaIlMonitor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2018-05-03T05:45:23.927+0000)
>
> If tanks are shit its because the player on them isnt getting carried...

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/by-winrate

Look at that. Tanks have some of the worst overall win-rates in the game. We can whine about assassins, fighters, ADCs, whatever. Tanks are some of the worst overall champs to pick if you care about winning. You got singed, who basically goes dmg, and then Sion all the way down at 23. Then what? Malphite at 40? Another damage building tank. Maokai falling in at 68. There are less tanks in the top 20 win-rates than any other role. Lol.

Get my drift? Top lane tanks blow in solo Q. If you wanna flip a coin and hope to god anyone else on the map can carry, well, pick a top lane tank. 

You are right. Its because they flipped a coin hoping some other position carried when they locked in a top lane tank.
Its because tanks cant carry. That was my point. They have to have good players on the team to carry them. Even a 5-0 mao with a 0-10 bot lane cant win. something like Cammile at least has a chance.

> [{quoted}](name=HaIlMonitor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=000000000002000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-04T04:22:48.835+0000)
>
> Its because tanks cant carry. That was my point. They have to have good players on the team to carry them. Even a 5-0 mao with a 0-10 bot lane cant win. something like Cammile at least has a chance.

They can carry IF the team has weak tank killing champs. Its rare as hell though. I carried a game the other day on Maokai where I was invincible, but I dont think there was any champs in the game that you would consider tank killers. 

Lemme look: Yea Ashe/Morg/Irelia/Braum/Sej. Morg is a terrible mid, Ashe is a weak dmg ADC. No dmg jg. Game over. I could 1v5. I did 14k dmg to my ADC's 7k lol. I think they lost bot but Ashe can't kill shit, so didn't matter.

You dont get those unicorn games very often though. 9 games out of 10, someone else has to carry. Be it bot lane, or mid, or jg.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Loki1987,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-02T10:08:27.756+0000)
>
> Obvious answer. Perma ban and learn to fight a Yasuo with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items.

1 item, pretty sure yas has 100% at 1 item with ie.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2018-05-03T01:57:00.023+0000)
>
> 1 item, pretty sure yas has 100% at 1 item with ie.

No the new IE doesn't give crit, it just doubles your crit chance

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Loki1987,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=000000030001,timestamp=2018-05-03T10:25:45.794+0000)
>
> No the new IE doesn't give crit, it just doubles your crit chance

But he also doesn't need the full second item. I'll count it as a 1.5 item for 100%
IE + Zeal only gives 80% crit
yasuo yi tryndamere and zed are gonna be rediculus can i get 4 bans please LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Loki1987,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-02T10:08:27.756+0000)
>
> Obvious answer. Perma ban and learn to fight a Yasuo with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items.

The comedy is oozing of this comment. This is how all comments should be here.

> [{quoted}](name=Mokuto Bunshi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00000006,timestamp=2018-05-03T13:52:10.084+0000)
>
> The comedy is oozing of this comment. This is how all comments should be here.

Thanks, I try xD

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Loki1987,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-02T10:08:27.756+0000)
>
> Obvious answer. Perma ban and learn to fight a Yasuo with 100% crit and 36%-40% true damage at 2 items.

this is what league is now

> [{quoted}](name=Razör,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00000005,timestamp=2018-05-03T11:32:04.010+0000)
>
> this is what league is now

It's funny really. I was watching some S5 to see the old Malzahar and noticed one thing more than anything else: Everyone had only 1 completed item at 20 minutes. I found this interesting because there was a fed lux and riven, but still no massive snowball like we see today. How things have changed...
He's already a pain in the ass to deal with, oh lord.
Get a lot of Lube. And you probably should start stretching now. You gonna need it.

Hmmm... Fizz or Zed? Can't decide which to perma ban anymore...












Fuck

Well, Fizz needs to at least hit his R to kill you, which isn't the easiest to land ever since they changed the attachment mechanic. Apart from that, he is useless and not even oppressive in lane. Zed has much easier assassination, much easier escape, much easier laning phase, which he can also poke you etc.

You can handle Fizz in general, but Zed is honestly beyond control, or will be after 8.10.

> [{quoted}](name=Snowman Arc,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2018-05-02T14:23:15.719+0000)
>
> Well, Fizz needs to at least hit his R to kill you, which isn't the easiest to land ever since they changed the attachment mechanic. Apart from that, he is useless and not even oppressive in lane. Zed has much easier assassination, much easier escape, much easier laning phase, which he can also poke you etc.
> 
> You can handle Fizz in general, but Zed is honestly beyond control, or will be after 8.10.

A Fizz lane also means in general you'll have a very hard time poking him out of lane, since he starts corrupting potion anyways. His E means banking him is a pain too, and I hate most about his R is that there's no animation for him charging it basically, he can just toss it out point blank with no time to react. Zed gives you a little time at least.

Maw wasn't buffed.

Its actually a nerf since currently, the item alone shields for 345 damage + the rest of your bonus MR, but now it shields a flat 350 at all times. 

Only things buffed about it were the base stats.

Wait what? 
AD: 50 -> 60
MR: 45 -> 50
Huge buffs from the get go. That's already an increase of 440 gold in efficiency.
For the magic shield, the item alone, right now, grants 300 + 100% bonus MR magic shield damage (345). In the PBE, it grants a flat 350.       

Seeing how most champions who pick up this item do not build further MR, the magic shield is still bigger. The only chance it's slightly weaker is if they purchase merc treads (quite often, to be fair), but that's pretty much all about it.
Assassins don't build MR, top laners rarely build this and if any ADC does, that's the only MR they take.

It's a big buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Tormentula,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YajXAkvP,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-05-02T12:29:47.351+0000)
>
> Maw wasn't buffed.
> 
> Its actually a nerf since currently, the item alone shields for 345 damage + the rest of your bonus MR, but now it shields a flat 350 at all times. 
> 
> Only things buffed about it were the base stats.

No it shields for 300 + 100% bonus mr.So its not nerf.its more like a buff.Cause assasins dont stack alot mr anyway.
i can't wait to see ad assassin's become the new bot lane picks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
and we forgotting he can now grab stormrazor too? im sure he gets at least one auto in when he ultis... thats going to hit for a LOT

Well, it’ll at least be some wasted stats as zed scales poorly with AS
Whether that’ll be enough to stop him from buying it remains to be seen
RichBoy Redmercy bribed Riot into buffing Zed.
I mean, I already perma banned Zed whenever I played mid, so not much change for me.
I would like to hand you the ban-hammer, but I sadly still need it for Kai'sa.
Im not scared at all. Im already banning him every game

Meh doesn't matter for me



Zed is top priority for my ban list

These changes are being pushed back to 8.11
Thankfully, they're not being released in this state.
Ban him?
i mean how else you supposed to make up for him being unplayable for like 4-5 patches cause duskblade nerfs league of  stopwatch etc. but now he gonna be perma banned again

GA buffs makes up for the lower base armor and adc's got their hp per level increased by alot. This will make you harder to kill lategame and someone made a post after crunching numbers; adc's have 6% less dmg with just crit items but once you buy lw it's a huge buff to squishy targets.

So basically assassins will be stronger early game but adc's will esclipe them later. I think that's good game design imo.
